titleStmt.title: A brief collection of many rare secrets many of which are approved and physical and the rest most pleasant and recreative : very necessary for all sorts of people / newly set forth and published by La Fountain, an expert operator.
titleStmt.author: La Fountaine.
Fountaine, Edward.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Edward Fountaine.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
